attribute-definition.description: Not allowed to do partial capture.
API Signature passphrase configured in HiPay's back office. Used to verify the requests made to DW.
CSS applied to either Hosted or iFrame page, not enclosed in style tags
Enables/disables the payment method selector on iFrame and Hosted page
Allows the activation of 3-D Secure if available on the card being used
If the order total is higher than the specified sum, then 3-D Secure will be forced. If 0 is specified, the rule is disabled.
Enable/disable One-Click payments
Test Mode: If enabled, the module will use the HiPay TPP test platform
Number of minutes after which all orders hung in status "CREATED" and left unprocessed for payment are cleared.
If iFrame operating mode is chosen, you can select your iFrame height to fit with your CSS
If iFrame operating mode is chosen, you can select your iFrame width to fit with your CSS
Defines which operation payment mode to be used
Please refer to HiPayTPP-GatewayAPI documentation, chapter 3.1 Request a New Order (Order Parameters â€“ operation)
Comma-separated list of all shipping methods that will be in use for Oney payment method
Signals if there are inventory lists for brick-and-mortar stores associated with this product.
Type of Boot for search refinement.
Bottom type for search refinement
Product color used for variation attribute
Use this attribute to apply custom styles for this product.
This indiciates if the product is a new arrival.
This is the help text. It is used for sorting rules.
Kids Age used for search refinements
This attribute is used for mens and womens pants lengths.
Media Format
Memory Size
Type of Outerwear for search refinement
Type of Sandal for search refinement
test attribute
Type of Shoe for search refinements
This attribute is used for all footwear, apparel and accessory sizing for men, women and kids products.

Attribute used for apparel waist sizing.
This attribute is used for shoe widths for mens, womens and kids.
